sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import Loader from '../components/Loader'; import Message from '../components/Message'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' function ProductScreen() { const {id} = useParams() const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector(state=>state.productDetails) const {loading, error, product} = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(id)) }, []) return
Go Back {loading ? : error ? {error} :(

{product.name}

Price: ${product.price}
{product.description}
 Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) }
; } export default ProductScreen;
